name: Starfighter Neon
description: You've been dropped into enemy space. Weave your Starfighter between alien spaceships, lasers, asteroids and bombs destroying as many as you can and collecting valuable coins and powerups as you go.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 + Processor: 1.4Ghz Core 2 Duo Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB + DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Sure, why not. All the sfx were made with the awesome Bfxr tool. Additional Notes: The game should not be overly resource hungry (tested on a 2010 MacBook Air running Windows 10), if you have a frame rate issue, try lowering the resolution from the settings menu.
